metadata-viewer.title: View Metadata
metadata-viewer.description: The metadata will be displayed in JSON format, where piece hash values are not displayed by default.

torrent-generator.title: Generate Torrent
torrent-generator.description: By selecting files or directories to share, you can easily create a torrent file containing metadata.
torrent-generator.file-path-placeholder: Please select files or directories to share
torrent-generator.tracker-url-placeholder: Enter multiple URLs with line breaks
torrent-generator.weebseeds-url-placeholder: Optional, enter multiple URLs with line breaks
torrent-generator.piece-alignment-desc: Check to avoid splitting two files into the same piece
torrent-generator.private-torrent-desc: Check and the torrent will not be distributed on the DHT network
torrent-generator.url-illegal: URL is invalid, please ensure it starts with http:// or https://

about.title: About Tor
about.intro: A BitTorrent utility that can view BitTorrent metadata and generate BitTorrent files.
about.author: Author
